description: Backlog of near-term improvements to strengthen automatic enforcement of the comprehensive business BDD specification prior to tests.

items.title: Tighten spec age threshold & parameterize
items.details: Reduce allowable spec artifact age from 24h to 6h (configurable via VERIFY_BDD_SPEC_MAX_AGE_HOURS env variable). Fail fast if exceeded.
items.motivation: Ensure spec updates occur at least once per working half-day to reflect new handlers and scenarios.

items.title: Add workflow version alignment check
items.details: Compare spec.version or summary.version with handler-implementation.workflow.json version; fail if mismatch (unless explicitly overridden).
items.motivation: Keep spec synchronized with workflow evolution (phases, steps influencing scenarios).

items.title: Validate every spec handler exists in code (reverse direction)
items.details: Enumerate handler names declared in spec JSON and assert corresponding source handler or orchestrator exists (including anomaly, baseline, diagnosis sequences).
items.motivation: Prevent drift where deprecated handlers remain documented but removed in code.
acceptance: All spec handlers resolved to file path

items.title: Auto-regenerate spec on initial failure then re-verify
items.details: If file missing or stale, invoke generate script (generate-comprehensive-business-bdd-specs.js) once, then re-run validations; final failure only if second pass fails.
items.motivation: Reduce friction; keep enforcement strict but self-healing.

items.title: Produce structured drift report JSON on failure
items.details: Emit .generated/spec-enforcement-failure-report.json summarizing missing handlers, obsolete spec entries, age, version mismatch, recommendations.

items.title: Define value units & point weights
items.details: Create value-units.json enumerating categories (Observability, RiskReduction, PerformanceAssurance, Governance) with point weights.
items.motivation: Enable Planned Value (PV) quantification per slice.

items.title: Capture initial baseline snapshot for AV comparison
items.details: Generate self-healing-value-baseline.json recording current absence of diagnosis categories, SLO features, rebase, and governance enhancements.
items.motivation: Establish baseline for Actual Value (AV) measurement.

items.title: Add progress tracking template for PV vs AV
items.details: Create self-healing-progress.json with per-sprint sections: plannedPoints, earnedPoints (EV), valueVariance, VPI.

items.title: Embed numeric thresholds in sprint acceptance criteria
items.details: Augment sprint plan acceptance criteria with measurable targets (e.g., breach precision >=90%, recommendations coverage >=80%).
items.motivation: Convert qualitative goals into quantifiable PV.

items.title: Document EV, SV, VPI formulas
items.details: Add section to sprint plan or separate ev-variance-metrics.md describing formulas and interpretation for Earned Value, Schedule Variance, Value Performance Index.

items.title: Enforce presence & validity of demo process spec
items.details: Add verify-demo-spec.js to pretest ensuring DEMO_PROCESS_SPEC.json exists with objectives, resources, steps, Andon triggers.
items.motivation: Prevent missing demo design artifacts and resource gaps before iteration demo.
acceptance: Fails if spec missing or malformed

items.title: Govern synthetic telemetry with review process & verification
items.details: Document review process (SYNTHETIC_TELEMETRY_REVIEW_PROCESS.md) and add verify-synthetic-telemetry.js to pretest (lenient by default, strict via env flags).
items.motivation: Avoid data falsehood/contamination while enabling safe demos.
